data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

The directions are to always face forward. If you take 9 steps left, you go 9 steps left, Take 10 steps forward. If you take 9 steps right, you go 9 steps right, Take 10 steps backward. They are the same directions. Therefore, the answer is Yes.
